q2_2025_summary.overall_assessment: Fund 3 shows better resilience than Fund 2 but faces emerging challenges

critical_findings.detail: Occupancy fell from 99.7% to 91.8% in 6 months
critical_findings.impact: 1.0M SF vacant, representing $11.0M potential annual revenue

critical_findings.detail: WALT declined 3.0 months from 49.2 to 46.2 months
critical_findings.impact: Shorter lease terms indicate reduced tenant commitment

critical_findings.detail: Higher rent/SF ($8.59 vs $7.09) and better tenant diversity
critical_findings.impact: Stronger market position provides negotiating leverage

immediate_actions.details: Target all leases expiring in next 18 months with renewal incentives
immediate_actions.target: Secure 90% renewal rate on quality tenants

immediate_actions.details: Focus on creditworthy tenants with 5+ year lease terms
immediate_actions.target: Maintain rent premiums while improving occupancy

immediate_actions.details: Identify properties with concentrated vacancy for targeted action
immediate_actions.target: Prioritize leasing efforts at high-impact properties

30_day_actions.details: Survey all tenants to identify retention risks and improvement areas

30_day_actions.target: Maintain rent premium while closing occupancy gap

90_day_actions.details: Invest $8-10M in property upgrades focused on tenant retention
90_day_actions.target: Upgrade 50% of properties with upcoming renewals

90_day_actions.details: Offer TI allowances for 7+ year lease terms

opportunities: Premium positioning allows selective tenant acceptance
Strong fundamentals support rent growth strategy

primary_risks: WALT continuing to decline below 45 months
Loss of rent premium due to market conditions
mitigation_strategies: Implement 'early bird' renewal program 18 months before expiry
Create tenant loyalty program with rent credits
Establish maximum vacancy threshold of 10% triggering action plan
